basic_info.name: Jayasoorya Jithendra
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Jayasoorya Jithendra, a Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience, currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at SUNY Buffalo. I specialize in Frontend and Full Stack Development and also have solid academic and project experience in Data Science and Machine Learning. I've contributed to impactful products at Dassault SystÃ¨mes, Siemens, and Synoriq, and I build scalable, user-friendly applications using technologies like React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I'm actively seeking Software Development or Data Science Internship opportunities across the U.S. to apply and grow my skills in real-world, innovative projects.
basic_info.philosophy: Iâ€™m a passionate, fast-learning technologist with a strong foundation in both frontend engineering and data-driven development. I thrive in agile, collaborative environments and enjoy solving problems through clean, maintainable code. With a track record of technical leadership, mentoring, and impactful contributions across web development and ML projects, I bring a balanced mix of product thinking and engineering depth. I believe in continuous learning, thoughtful design, and delivering value through scalable solutions.
basic_info.preference: I'm currently looking for Software Development, Frontend, Full Stack, or Data Science / Machine Learning Internship roles in the U.S. I am not considering relocation back to India and am open to remote or in-person roles anywhere in the U.S. Iâ€™m especially excited about working with modern tech stacks involving React, Node.js, Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud platforms like AWS or Azure, and contributing to data-driven products and scalable platforms.

projects.title: MotoAssist
projects.description: React based dashboard and axios services where users can create new bookings for bike services and repair and manage them

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: A social media application built on React and NodeJs where users can create posts with pcitures, add tags, like posts etc.

projects.title: Restaurant Booking App
projects.description: A hotel reservation application built on React and NodeJs where users can reserve tables and make bookings

projects.title: Sticky Notes
projects.description: A sticky note application built on React and NodeJs where users can create, edit and maintain their notes

icons.title: Full-Stack Web Development
icons.description: I have skills and experience to develop full-stack web applications and services in a variety of technologies. My knowledge area for full-stack apps includes HTML/CSS/JS, MERN stack, AWS. I'm able to create and maintain APIs, web servers, and dockerized environments.

icons.title: Database Systems
icons.description: I have a detailed level of understanding of relational database management systems. I have experience with normalization and a wide range of SQL languages, most notably MySQL/MariaDB, and NoSQL such as MongoDB and Redis. I also have the know-how to implement and use databases in software applications and RESTful APIs.

icons.title: E-Commerce
icons.description: I know the business and have experience with developing an e-commerce site. The Business and Web module I undertook involved responsive web design through CSS frameworks, and marketing includes social media, email, and blogging.

icons.title: Project Management
icons.description: Through project management modules in education and working in an agile environment, I have experience with working with project planning. I'm able to work in Agile methodologies such as SCRUM with the inclusion of DevOps, Continuous Testing/Delivery, and Kanban Boards.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: I worked at Siemens in Bangalore, as part of its MindSphere and WinCC Unified Edge technologies. My role there was of a Software Developer, where I was a part of a fast-paced and encouraging workforce. My responsibilities include:
responsibilities: Providing system support for all environments including our production teams
Working on the technical implementation of apps and infrastructure
Supporting the creation of standardized documentation and code review
Developing, testing and supporting current systems

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: I worked among a team of peers to use Machine Learning to build a recommendation engine that could suggest movies to users based on their viewing history. This was a full-time internship, during summer break.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Focussing on the e-commerce website, I worked on making the site compatible with more types of screens and cleared bugs that happen at different resolutions. This was mainly in the evenings, after my undergrad classes, and during holidays
